spells.name: Adhesive Spittle
spells.description: Spit a tanglefoot bag at a creature.

spells.name: Alter Musical Instrument>
spells.description: Make one instrument sound like a different kind of instrument.

spells.name: Blurred Movement
spells.description: As blur, but only while you are moving.

spells.name: Body Capacitance
spells.description: Store electricity attacks used against you and release the energy as a touch attack.

spells.name: Discern Next of Kin
spells.description: Read the target's mind to learn about its family.

spells.name: Disguise Weapon
spells.description: Changes one weapon's appearance.

spells.name: Gentle Breeze
spells.description: Light wind protects one target from clouds, gases, heat, and vapors.

spells.name: Glue Seal
spells.description: Makes one 5-ft. square or one object sticky.

spells.name: Heightened Awareness
spells.description: Your recall and ability to process information improve.

spells.name: Invisibility Alarm
spells.description: As alarm, but reacting only to invisible creatures.

spells.name: Line in the Sand
spells.description: Increase your attacks of opportunity per round.

spells.name: Long Arm
spells.description: Your arms lengthen, giving you extra reach.

spells.name: Memorize Page
spells.description: Target perfectly memorizes one page of information.

spells.name: Mirror Polish
spells.description: Polish a metal item until it's usable as a mirror.

spells.name: Monkey Fish
spells.description: Gain a climb speed and a swim speed of 10 ft. for a time.

spells.name: Phantom Blood
spells.description: Gain temporary hp if Con loss would knock you out or kill you.

spells.name: Refine Improvised Weapon
spells.description: Transform improvised weapon into a masterwork simple or martial weapon.

spells.name: Repair Undead
spells.description: Heals one undead of 1d8 hp + 1/level (max +5).

spells.name: Stunning Barrier
spells.description: Magical field grants a +1 bonus to AC and on saves, and stuns one creature attacking you.

spells.name: Sunder Breaker
spells.description: The next weapon that sunders an item belonging to the target takes damage.

spells.name: Sundering Shards
spells.description: Sundered item explodes, dealing 1d6 damage to adjacent creatures.

spells.name: Thunderstomp
spells.description: Trip one creature within range.

spells.name: Wave Shield
spells.description: Water blunts one incoming attack or fire effect.
